Alex Williams | A site about my research in Computational and Theoretical Neuroscience

Home: This is where you are right now.

About Me: A short bio about me, my hobbies, and interests.

Publications: A list of peer-reviewed publications, and links to match them.

Projects: Short descriptions of things that I'm currently working on (as well as an archive of old projects).

Resources: I'm trying to put up some basic advice here for undergrads who are interested in computational neuroscience. Also, some reccomendations for websites, books, and papers.

Things I Feel Strongly About: Enter at your own risk.
